oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A new algorithm for compensator design for higher-order system via reduced model
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BANDYOPADHYAY, B
UNBEHAUEN, H
PATRE, BM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: reduction
suboptimal control
order reduction
output feedback
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper a method is presented to design an output feedback compensator for a higher-order system via its reduced-order model. The advantages of the method are twofold: first is, the states are not required for feedback and secondly when the compensator is placed in the closed loop with the higher-order system it guarantees the closed-loop stability. The method is simple and can be easily implemented. The method is illustrated via a numerical example. (C) 1998 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 7th IFAC Symposium on Computer Aided Control Systems Design,GHENT, BELGIUM,APR 28-30, 1997
